detectors.description:
YFVVIPVote.isVotable(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YFVVIPVote.sol#199-216) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp < votingStarttimes[poolAddress][votingItem] (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YFVVIPVote.sol#200)
	- block.timestamp > votingEndtimes[poolAddress][votingItem] (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YFVVIPVote.sol#201)

detectors.description:
YFVVIPVote.vote(address,uint256,uint32) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YFVVIPVote.sol#244-280) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)(block.timestamp >= votingStarttimes[poolAddress][votingItem],voting is not open yet) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YFVVIPVote.sol#245)
	- require(bool,string)(block.timestamp <= votingEndtimes[poolAddress][votingItem],voting is closed) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YFVVIPVote.sol#246)
